channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP NetWeaver Enterprise Portal (Fiori Framework Page)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP NetWeaver Enterprise Portal (Fiori Framework Page)

item.title: CVE-2020-6323|2024-08-04T08:55:22.480Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20netweaver%20enterprise%20portal%20%28fiori%20framework%20page%29
item.description: SAP NetWeaver Enterprise Portal (Fiori Framework Page) versions - 7.50, 7.31, 7.40, does not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs and allows an attacker on a valid session to create an XSS that will be both reflected immediately and also be persisted and returned in further access to the system, resulting in Cross Site Scripting.
